CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 29, 1945, pg. 12, reads: "Tradition - Mr. and Mrs. Albert Thompson of 2332 La Place Street, and their daughters, Alberta, Vera and Barbara, enjoy the first peace-time Christmas in four years in traditional style as they gather around the tree to open and admire the gifts. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Thompson family, including daughters Alberta Thompson, Vera Thompson (Matthews), Barbara Thompson (Mason), and Mrs. Thompson gathered around Christmas tree with toys and cat, in their home at 2332 La Place Street
